meanings.definition: The act of bestowing or granting something, such as an honor or degree.
meanings.sent1: The conferment of the award brought joy to the recipient.
meanings.sent2: The conferment of the title was a momentous occasion.
meanings.sent3: The conferment of the prize caused a happy dance.
meanings.sent4: The conferment of the scholarship opened new doors for the student.
meanings.sent5: The conferment of the medal shone brightly in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The result of conferring or giving something to someone.
meanings.sent1: After the conferment of the prize, celebrations ensued.
meanings.sent2: The conferment of the honor was well-deserved.
meanings.sent3: The conferment of the gift led to smiles all around.
meanings.sent4: The conferment of the certificate marked a significant achievement.
meanings.sent5: The conferment of the badge made the recipient proud.
